1 #ifndef VOXBLOX_UTILS_BUCKET_QUEUE_H_
2 #define VOXBLOX_UTILS_BUCKET_QUEUE_H_
3 
4 #include <glog/logging.h>
5 #include <deque>
6 #include <queue>
7 #include <vector>
8 
9 #include "voxblox/core/common.h"
10 
11 // Bucketed priority queue, mostly following L. Yatziv et al in
12 // O(N) Implementation of the Fast Marching Algorithm, though skipping the
13 // circular aspect (don't care about a bit more memory used for this).
14 
15 template <typename T>
16 class BucketQueue {
17  public:
18  EIGEN_MAKE_ALIGNED_OPERATOR_NEW
19 
20  BucketQueue() : last_bucket_index_(0) {}
21  explicit BucketQueue(int num_buckets, double max_val)
22  : num_buckets_(num_buckets),
23  max_val_(max_val),
24  last_bucket_index_(0),
25  num_elements_(0) {
26  buckets_.resize(num_buckets_);
27  }
28 
29  // WARNING: will CLEAR THE QUEUE!
30  void setNumBuckets(int num_buckets, double max_val) {
31  max_val_ = max_val;
32  num_buckets_ = num_buckets;
33  buckets_.clear();
34  buckets_.resize(num_buckets_);
35  num_elements_ = 0;
36  }
37 
38  void push(const T& key, double value) {
39  CHECK_NE(num_buckets_, 0);
40  if (value > max_val_) {
41  value = max_val_;
42  }
43  int bucket_index =
44  std::floor(std::abs(value) / max_val_ * (num_buckets_ - 1));
45  if (bucket_index >= num_buckets_) {
46  bucket_index = num_buckets_ - 1;
47  }
48  if (bucket_index < last_bucket_index_) {
49  last_bucket_index_ = bucket_index;
50  }
51  buckets_[bucket_index].push(key);
52  num_elements_++;
53  }
54 
55  void pop() {
56  if (empty()) {
57  return;
58  }
59  while (buckets_[last_bucket_index_].empty() &&
60  last_bucket_index_ < num_buckets_) {
61  last_bucket_index_++;
62  }
63  if (last_bucket_index_ < num_buckets_) {
64  buckets_[last_bucket_index_].pop();
65  num_elements_--;
66  }
67  }
68 
69  T front() {
70  CHECK_NE(num_buckets_, 0);
71  CHECK(!empty());
72  while (buckets_[last_bucket_index_].empty() &&
73  last_bucket_index_ < num_buckets_) {
74  last_bucket_index_++;
75  }
76  return buckets_[last_bucket_index_].front();
77  }
78 
79  bool empty() { return num_elements_ == 0; }
80 
81  void clear() {
82  buckets_.clear();
83  buckets_.resize(num_buckets_);
84  last_bucket_index_ = 0;
85  num_elements_ = 0;
86  }
87 
88  private:
89  int num_buckets_;
90  double max_val_;
91  voxblox::AlignedVector<voxblox::AlignedQueue<T>> buckets_;
92 
93  // Speed up retrivals.
94  int last_bucket_index_;
95  // This is also to speed up empty checks.
96  size_t num_elements_;
97 };
98 
99 #endif // VOXBLOX_UTILS_BUCKET_QUEUE_H_
